xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 20 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <ruthgrace> has joined #ccm 02:22 <ruthgrace> hey @sdumitriu, I have this process that respawns if I kill it. the process is called mysqld and the user is called mysql. 02:22 <ruthgrace> Do you know how to kill this process? 02:22 <ruthgrace> I have tried kill -TERM PID (this makes the process respawn) 02:24 <ruthgrace> and also mysqladmin -u root -p shutdown (it didn't find the mysqld to shut down) 02:24 <ruthgrace> and also mysqladmin -u mysql -p shutdown 02:24 <ruthgrace> and got 02:24 <ruthgrace> Warning: /usr/local/infobright/bin/mysqladmin: unknown variable 'loose-local-infile=1' Enter password: /usr/local/infobright/bin/mysqladmin: connect to server at 'localhost' failed error: 'Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/tmp/mysql-ib.sock' (2)' Check that mysqld is running and that the socket: '/tmp/mysql-ib.sock' exists! 02:26 <ruthgrace> I also keep getting the login failed error when I try to use MedSavant 02:27 <ruthgrace> by mvn install the shared, server, client, running the server engine .jar with -c medsavant.properties , and running the client .jar 02:35 <ruthgrace> I changed both mysql and mysqld-ib root passwords to the same thing, so I'm wondering if I'm unable to log on because of that process I can't kill 02:36 <ruthgrace> Maybe the MedSavantServerEngine is using that one, and I don't have the password for it since the user is mysql and not root? 07:57 <Shubham1> has joined #ccm 07:57 <Shubham1> Hi ! 12:33 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 13:24 <qwebirc63957> has joined #ccm 17:17 <qwebirc25631> has joined #ccm 19:36 <Guest83137> has joined #ccm 20:16 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 20:16 <Shubham> Hi ! 20:16 <sdumitriu> Hi Shubham 20:16 <sdumitriu> I looked at your application 20:17 <sdumitriu> It needs much more details in the Architecture part 20:17 <sdumitriu> That is the most important part of the application 20:18 <sdumitriu> It's the one that convinces the mentors that you're devoted to the project and that you're capable of implementing it 20:18 <Shubham1> has joined #ccm 20:18 <dev__> has joined #ccm 20:19 <sdumitriu> It should contained detailed plans for the project 20:19 <sdumitriu> What happens, when and why 20:20 <sdumitriu> Shubham1: Not sure if you got all of that, check http://phenotips.org/IRC/ccmArchive20140320 20:22 <Shubham1> Thanks, I'll work on making it more elaborate. Anything other than that ? 20:23 <sdumitriu> The rest looks good 20:24 <sdumitriu> Oh, something else 20:24 <sdumitriu> You should already start studying the research papers, so that you get a better understanding of the required work 20:25 <sdumitriu> I mean the paper and code referenced in the project description 20:32 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 20:34 <Shubham> Sure. I'm on it. Thanks. 20:48 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 21:01 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 21:09 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 21:22 <sanjhee_> has joined #ccm 23:04 <ruthgrace> has joined #ccm 23:27 <sanjhee_> has joined #ccm 23:53 <ruthgrace_> has joined #ccm
